message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

Looking at the income statement, the core operating activities would typically be represented by the main revenue streams of the business. In this case, the line item "Main Business Revenue" represents the income from the entity's core operations.

From the income statement provided:
- Main Business Revenue: 5991764.34 (dated 2024-01-29)

This is the income specifically arising from the entity's core operating activities.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5991764.34'} }
```
